channel.title: Paying for a RS2 Private Server
channel.description:
I want a server thats identical/closest to the original runescape as possible. I will pay with cash on paypal or runescape gp. If anyone will make me one like this, or already has one like this, add my msn.
MSN - Gtech@Gamerz-elite.com

item.title: Paying for a RS2 Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

ya im sorry guys didnt know… i shoulda read the rules…

and Br3ndan, I have bought one almost identical to the real runescape… It has all the shops, npcs, items (all set at the right price). It has almost everything. The only thing it dont have is Following dont work and the skills arnt 100% working… but almost…
